name: Mubitoperaciones S.A.P.I de C.V.
description: Provider of a storage service intended to store valuables and goods securely. The company allows users to store furniture, files, boxes, and anything they want in macro-warehouses with a single click, enabling individuals to ensure the benefit from hassle-less, economic, and intelligent storage.
one_liner: Provider of a storage service intended to store valuables and goods securely. The company allows users to store furniture, files, boxes, and anything they want in macro-warehouses with a single click, enabling individuals to ensure the benefit from hassle-less, economic, and intelligent storage.
